roi_calculation: High - Enables CI/CD quality gates and reduces regression time by 70%.
infrastructure_setup: CI integration, Pytest harness for Odoo, Playwright setup.
success_metrics: 90% of unit tests automated. 5 critical E2E paths automated. CI pipeline is stable.
risk_factors: Learning curve for Playwright with Odoo's dynamic UI.
mitigation_strategies: Develop reusable page object models for Odoo views.
business_value: Establish a solid regression safety net for core functionalities.

roi_calculation: Critical - Automates validation of high-risk external integrations and NFRs.
infrastructure_setup: Dedicated performance environment, security scanning tools in CI.
success_metrics: Automated performance benchmarks run weekly. Security scans run on every PR. API integration tests cover 95% of endpoints.
risk_factors: Complexity of performance script creation and result analysis.
mitigation_strategies: Start with baseline performance tests early. Involve DevOps in script setup.
business_value: Ensures the system is performant, secure, and reliable before go-live.
